overview:

Over the years, the treatment of the transaction in real estate and the activities of companies on the basis of software and was successful in each of them.

Kuldeep BE has a bachelor degree in computer science and engineering at the university RGPV. And possess various certificates in online and offline marketing including Google Advertising Professional, innovative advertising efforts and vendor management etc.
